title: British outsourcer Mitie sees higher costs from turnaround programme
text: March 16, 2018 / 7:31 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago British outsourcer Mitie sees higher costs from turnaround programme   (Reuters) - British outsourcing company Mitie Group ( MTO.L ) said on Friday it expected annual costs associated with its turnaround programme to be higher than its previous estimates. The company, which is in the midst of a recovery drive, said the turnaround costs were expected to be about 35 million pounds ($48.83 million) for the year ending March 31, compared with its previous estimate of 24 million pounds. Mitie, whose 2015-16 financial statements are being investigated by the British Financial Reporting Council, also said it expected latest full-year revenue is expected to grow 2-2.5 percent to 2.2 billion pounds. ($1 = 0.7168 pounds)
